verses.verse: Then came <WH935> <WH8799> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, even the whole congregation <WH5712>, into the desert <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>: and the people <WH5971> abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in Kadesh <WH6946>; and Miryam <WH4813> died <WH4191> <WH8799> there, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> there.
And there was no water <WH4325> for the congregation <WH5712>: and they gathered <WH6950> <WH8735> themselves together against Mosheh <WH4872> and against Aharon <WH175>.

And the people <WH5971> chode <WH7378> <WH8799> with Mosheh <WH4872>, and spake <WH559> <WH8799>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Would 'Elohim that <WH3863> we had died <WH1478> <WH8804> when our brethren <WH251> died <WH1478> <WH8800> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> !
And why have ye brought up <WH935> <WH8689> the congregation <WH6951> of the YY <WH3068> into this wilderness <WH4057>, that we and our cattle <WH1165> should die <WH4191> <WH8800> there?

And wherefore have ye made us to come up <WH5927> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714>, to bring <WH935> <WH8687> us in unto this evil <WH7451> place <WH4725>? it is no place <WH4725> of seed <WH2233>, or of figs <WH8384>, or of vines <WH1612>, or of pomegranates <WH7416>; neither is there any water <WH4325> to drink <WH8354> <WH8800>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> went <WH935> <WH8799> from the presence <WH6440> of the assembly <WH6951> unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and they fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon their faces <WH6440>: and the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto them.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Take <WH3947> <WH8798> the rod <WH4294>, and gather <WH6950> <WH8685> thou the assembly <WH5712> together, thou, and Aharon <WH175> thy brother <WH251>, and speak <WH1696> <WH8765> ye unto the rock <WH5553> before their eyes <WH5869>; and it shall give forth <WH5414> <WH8804> his water <WH4325>, and thou shalt bring forth <WH3318> <WH8689> to them water <WH4325> out of the rock <WH5553>: so thou shalt give <WH8248> the congregation <WH5712> and their beasts <WH1165> drink <WH8248> <WH8689>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the rod <WH4294> from before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, as he commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him.

And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> gathered <WH6950> <WH8686> the congregation <WH6951> together before <WH6440> the rock <WH5553>, and he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> now, ye rebels <WH4784> <WH8802>; must we fetch <WH3318> <WH8686> you water <WH4325> out of this rock <WH5553> ?

And Mosheh <WH4872> lifted up <WH7311> <WH8686> his hand <WH3027>, and with his rod <WH4294> he smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the rock <WH5553> twice <WH6471>: and the water <WH4325> came out <WH3318> <WH8799> abundantly <WH7227>, and the congregation <WH5712> drank <WH8354> <WH8799>, and their beasts <WH1165> also.

And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>, Because ye believed <WH539> <WH8689> me not, to sanctify <WH6942> <WH8687> me in the eyes <WH5869> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, therefore ye shall not bring <WH935> <WH8686> this congregation <WH6951> into the land <WH776> which I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> them.

This is <WH1992> the water <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809>; because the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> strove <WH7378> <WH8804> with the YY <WH3068>, and he was sanctified <WH6942> <WH8735> in them.

And Mosheh <WH4872> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> from Kadesh <WH6946> unto the king <WH4428> of Edom <WH123>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> thy brother <WH251> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> all the travail <WH8513> that hath befallen <WH4672> <WH8804> us:

How our fathers <WH1> went down <WH3381> <WH8799> into Egypt <WH4714>, and we have dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in Egypt <WH4714> a long <WH7227> time <WH3117>; and the Egyptians <WH4714> vexed <WH7489> <WH8686> us, and our fathers <WH1>:

And when we cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, he heard <WH8085> <WH8799> our voice <WH6963>, and sent <WH7971> <WH8799> an angel <WH4397>, and hath brought us forth <WH3318> <WH8686> out of Egypt <WH4714>: and, behold, we are in Kadesh <WH6946>, a city <WH5892> in the uttermost <WH7097> of thy border <WH1366>:

Let us pass <WH5674> <WH8799>, I pray thee, through thy country <WH776>: we will not pass <WH5674> <WH8799> through the fields <WH7704>, or through the vineyards <WH3754>, neither will we drink <WH8354> <WH8799> of the water <WH4325> of the wells <WH875>: we will go <WH3212> <WH8799> by the king's <WH4428> high way <WH1870>, we will not turn <WH5186> <WH8799> to the right hand <WH3225> nor to the left <WH8040>, until we have passed <WH5674> <WH8799> thy borders <WH1366>.
And Edom <WH123> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Thou shalt not pass <WH5674> <WH8799> by me, lest I come out <WH3318> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> thee with the sword <WH2719>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, We will go <WH5927> <WH8799> by the high way <WH4546>: and if I and my cattle <WH4735> drink <WH8354> <WH8799> of thy water <WH4325>, then I will pay <WH5414> <WH8804> <WH4377> for it: I will only, without doing any thing <WH1697> else, go through <WH5674> <WH8799> on my feet <WH7272>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thou shalt not go through <WH5674> <WH8799>. And Edom <WH123> came out <WH3318> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> him with much <WH3515> people <WH5971>, and with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>.

Thus Edom <WH123> refused <WH3985> <WH8762> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> Yisra'EL <WH3478> passage <WH5674> <WH8800> through his border <WH1366>: wherefore Yisra'EL <WH3478> turned away <WH5186> <WH8799> from him.
And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, even the whole congregation <WH5712>, journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799> from Kadesh <WH6946>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> unto mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> in mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>, by the coast <WH1366> of the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Aharon <WH175> shall be gathered <WH622> <WH8735> unto his people <WH5971>: for he shall not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the land <WH776> which I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, because ye rebelled against <WH4784> <WH8804> my word <WH6310> at the water <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809>.
Take <WH3947> <WH8798> Aharon <WH175> and Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121>, and bring them up <WH5927> <WH8685> unto mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>:

And strip <WH6584> <WH8685> Aharon <WH175> of his garments <WH899>, and put <WH3847> <WH8689> them upon Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121>: and Aharon <WH175> shall be gathered <WH622> <WH8735> unto his people, and shall die <WH4191> <WH8804> there.

And Mosheh <WH4872> did <WH6213> <WH8799> as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>: and they went up <WH5927> <WH8799> into mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> in the sight <WH5869> of all the congregation <WH5712>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> stripped <WH6584> <WH8686> Aharon <WH175> of his garments <WH899>, and put <WH3847> <WH8686> them upon Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121>; and Aharon <WH175> died <WH4191> <WH8799> there in the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022>: and Mosheh <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> came down <WH3381> <WH8799> from the mount <WH2022>.

And when all the congregation <WH5712> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that Aharon <WH175> was dead <WH1478> <WH8804>, they mourned <WH1058> <WH8799> for Aharon <WH175> thirty <WH7970> days <WH3117>, even all the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
